text: seonjijadeulkkeseo malhaessdeola cheonjileul changjohasin hananim-e gwanhae uisim haneunyo geubunkkeseo neohuileul buleusim-eun neohuiui joeleul yongseohago yagsogdoen gi gankkaji neohuileul yuyehagoja hasim-i la geudeul-i malhagil sillo dangsindeul-eun uliwa gat-eun ingan-e bulgwahadoda dangsindeul-eun uliui seonjodeul-i sungbaeha deon geos-eulobuteo ulileul meolli halyeo haneunyo uliege bunmyeonghan yejeung-eul boila hadeola
